== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&AMP;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0026/index.htm U+00026].
  * `&AMP` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0026/index.htm U+00026].
  * `&amp;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0026/index.htm U+00026].
  * `&amp` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0026/index.htm U+00026].
